attributes.action:
The government should do something about excessive 
plastic packaging
attributes.background: There are many confectionary packagings made of plastic that have excessive amounts of room. E.g. Crisp packets are only half full and therefore, packaging could be reduced in size. Other confectionary items could look into using recyclable materials to benefit the environment.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200189
